1.19.2.1.0.1:
- Fixed keyboard not showing in the instruments tab
- Fixed Looper being in the instruments tab rather than instrument accessories
1.19.2.1.1:
- Added compatibility with Genshin Instruments v3.2.3
- The Violin can now extend/shorten its sound length by simply pressing the set keybind! (Right Cntrl by default)
- Fixed humongous note block instrument on large GUI scales
1.19.2.1.1.1: Fixed violin sound length modifier seldom working
1.19.2.2.0:
Changes:
- New instrument: The Guitar!
- Full MIDI support, as per Genshin Instruments v3.3! (with the exception of note block instruments)
- The Looper now emits note particles (color-relative to the playing pitch)
- Parrots now dance to loopers! ðŸ¦œðŸª©
- The Looper will now reset upon a redstone signal
- The Trombone in the GUI has been flipped to match the regular rotation of items
- The default violin sound type modifier is now Right Alt

Fixed:
- Violin & Trombone audio latency
- Note block instruments' layout being flipped
- Being unable to play a looper while holding an instrument
- Trombone's colors being too shiny
1.19.2.2.1:
- Updated to Minecraft version 1.20.2!
- Updated to Genshin Instruments v3.3.1
- Reworked instrument item textures by GenMode!
- Added MIDI Pedal input for the Violin
